TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks (当 `CommandName` 单击控件中 ) 属性设置为 "delete" 按钮，但在 控件删除记录之前，控件引发事件。The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but before the control deletes the record. 这使您可以在每次发生此事件时，提供一个执行自定义例程的事件处理程序，如在删除记录之前验证记录。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as verifying a record before deleting it, whenever this event occurs. 对象传递到事件处理程序，该处理程序允许您确定要删除的记录的索引，并指示应取消删除操作。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the index of the record being deleted and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled. 若要确定记录的索引，请使用 属性。To determine the index of a record, use the property. 若要取消删除操作，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To cancel the delete operation, set the property to `true`. 你还可以分别使用和属性访问键字段和非键字段 。You can also access the key fields and non-key fields by using the and properties, respectively. 如果您想要在删除之前验证记录，这些值将很有用。These values are useful if you want to verify the record before deleting it. > [!NOTE] > 可以修改属性中的键字段值 。It is possible to modify the key field values in the property. 如果更改这些值，则将删除对应于新键字段值的记录。If you change these values, the record that corresponds to the new key field values will be deleted. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 有关类的实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 传递给事件的事件处理程序的对象 取消删除操作。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event handler for the event to cancel a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewdeleteeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewdeleteeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 rowIndex) cil managed

span.span: The index of the row being deleted.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了类的实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of the class. |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`rowIndex` 参数的值。The value of the `rowIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取键字段名称/值对的有序字典，其中包含已删除项的键字段的名称和值。

span.span: Gets an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs that contains the names and values of the key fields of the deleted items.

value.span: 一个 ，包含用于匹配要删除的项的键字段名称/值对的有序字典。

span.span: An that contains an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs used to match the item to delete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以访问要删除的记录的一个或多个键字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the key field or fields for the record to be deleted. 例如，您可以使用这些值来验证记录，然后再删除记录、更改要删除的记录或保存已删除记录的日志。For example, you can use these values to verify the record before deleting it, to change the record to delete, or to keep a log of deleted records. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅包含键字段。This property contains only the key fields. 若要访问非键字段的名称/值对值，请使用 属性。To access the name/value pair values for the non-key fields, use the property. 属性返回一个实现 接口的对象。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含 表示键字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the key fields. > [!NOTE] > 作为一种快捷方式，还可以使用对象的索引器 访问键字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the key field values. 使用索引器的优点是它直接返回键字段值。The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns key field values directly. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以修改其返回的对象的键字段值 。This property is read-only; however, you can modify the key field values of the object it returns. 如果更改键字段值，则将从数据源中删除相应的记录。If you change the key field values, the corresponding record is be deleted from the data source. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性访问要删除的记录的键字段的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the value of the key field for the record being deleted. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewdeleteeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewdeleteeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets the index of the row being deleted.
The index of the row being deleted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定要删除的行的索引。Use the property to determine the index of the row being deleted. 行索引通常用于从控件集合中检索指定的行 ，这允许您访问行的属性。The row index is often used to retrieve the specified row from the collection of the control, which allows you to access the row's properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定要删除的行的索引。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the index of the row being deleted. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewdeleteeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewdeleteeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取包含要删除的项的非键字段名称/值对的字典。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the item to delete.

value.span: 包含要删除项的非键字段名称/值对的字典的 。

span.span: A that contains a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the item to delete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以访问要删除的记录的非键字段值。Use the property to access the values of the non-key fields for the record to be deleted. 例如，你可以使用这些值来验证记录，然后再将其删除，或者保留已删除记录的日志。For example, you can use these values to verify the record before deleting it, or to keep a log of deleted records. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不包含键字段。This property does not contain the key field or fields. 若要访问键字段的名称/值对值，请使用 属性。To access the name/value pair values for the key field or fields, use the property. 属性返回一个实现 接口的对象。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含 表示非键字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the non-key fields. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，还可以使用对象的索引器 来访问字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values. 使用索引器的优点是它直接返回字段值。The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns field values directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来访问要删除的记录的非键字段的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the non-key fields of the record being deleted. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewdeleteeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeleteEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewdeleteeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]
